alert.note: Alert for Buffalo; Hall (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Hastings (North Central Kansas and South Central Nebraska)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 09 at 6:16PM CDT by NWS Hastings
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Adams, Kearney, Buffalo and Hall Counties through 700 PM CDT... At 616 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Doniphan to 6 miles north of Axtell. Movement was southeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Strong thunderstorms will be near... Grand Island, Doniphan and Alda around 620 PM CDT. Other locations in the path of these storms include Heartwell and Norman. This includes Interstate 80 between mile markers 268 and 317. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
